unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Distribution of Race Times
question_text: Jane and Joan are both on the track team and run the $400\text{-meter}$ dash. Jane’s average time is $62.3\text{ seconds}$ with a standard deviation of $1.2\text{ seconds}$ , while Joan’s average time is $62.5\text{ seconds}$ with a standard deviation of $1.4\text{ seconds}$ . If race times are approximately normally distributed, what is the probability of Joan winning the next race?
